Pre-Game Insights: Germany coach Julian Nagelsmann said: 'First and foremost, there's a lot of anticipation because it's a huge event.'
Scotland forward Ryan Christie said: 'It's going to be an amazing experience … being part of that kind of opening ceremony.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany has another, rather more unusual motivation to win the trophy on its own turf. Deniz Undav has said he will shave the head of fellow Germany forward Thomas Müller if the team becomes European champion.
Others: There is hardly a sighting of a Germany shirt or flag in Munich, due to political extremism and anxiety in the country.
